author: mbenson
msg: add junitreport ; remove Ant dependencies that AFAICT are really needed,

author: mprudhom
msg: Fixed bug where we were creating the delete query in the setUp(), but never actually executing it.

author: mturyn
msg: Bug: Window's width is unchanged (from, possibly, a large value) when the window
is minimised.  Window also keeps the same left and top.
1.) Window narrowed (to 8 action icons' width) on minimise.
2.) Titlebar text div shrunk to fit, and overflow hidden.
3.) Minimised window is placed in a slot near the bottom; if
maximised or restored, and then minimised, goes back to the same slot.
Problems:  Item 3.) sup. is _not_ the implementation of a full-fledged window
manager, so that with many windows minimised, and a container changing size
dramatically, strange effects can occur, especially gaps in the minimised window

author: gnodet
msg: Fix badly formatted comment in xquery
